name: Bumsoo Scott Shin
quote: There is no Context without Concept.

bio.paragraph: Graduate of Cleveland Institute of Art with bachelor’s degree of Illustration, Bumsoo (Scott) Shin, focus his art career as a 2D character and creature concept art. His art style is flexible to fit the clients’ taste or with the project’s theme.

While studying in CIA, Scott also took minor classes for Graphic Design and Game Design. His original career plan was to become a game designer but realized in 1st year of college that he much preferred Illustration. Nonetheless, he still enjoys very much of designing a game and bringing up fresh ideas to aid the teammates for a better-quality game. Scott also loves working on Adobe Illustrator and create vector images that symbolizes the creatures/characters he designed. Scott was inspired ever since his childhood watching movies, animation, and playing videogames hoping to help create equally or even greater entertaining projects for the people.
Scott is currently working with GGS team as a 2D Concept Artist and spends his spare time brainstorming how he can aid his teammates produce high-quality projects.
